programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep512

programme.title: Top Wing S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Penny makes a friend, and saves the day, when a stranded polar-bear family floats into the warm water near Big Swirl Island. // Team Top Wing saves Shirley Squirrely.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep101

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Calvin has lost ROBO G's birthday present. It's now being held captive by a mysterious underwater creature that loves shiny objects. Can he summon his PLAY POWER and find it?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep514

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep516
programme.desc: When showman Gil's 'real live dragon' (actually a Komodo Dragon) gets loose in the small town of Bubbleville, it's up to Pet Finders Oona and Zooli to track the lizard down and return it to its home.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep517

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep518

programme.title: Hwang Jin Yi
programme.desc: This is the story about the life of a Joseon-era dancer, musician and poet, Hwang Jin Yi, who seeks perfection in her art relentlessly and the hardships facing women due to their lowly social status.

programme.title: The Divine Move
programme.desc: Go player Tae Seok is framed and imprisoned for his brother's death after losing a high-stakes game. After his sentence, he sets out for revenge against the underground gambler who destroyed his life.

programme.title: For the Emperor
programme.desc: Former baseball player involved in fixing game was recruited to work for private loan company. He also falls for bar owner Yeon-Soo, and slowly unleashes his endless desire and ambition...

programme.title: The Battleship Island

programme.title: The Front Line

programme.title: Thread of Lies
programme.desc: Blindsided by the suicide of her 14-year-old daughter, her mother and older sister set out to solve the mystery of her death, insinuating themselves into the life of the girl who bullied her.

programme.title: Vanishing Time: a Boy Who Returned
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy goes missing after venturing into a cave in a forest with his friends and later mysteriously reappears a few days later as man in his 30s.

programme.title: The Scam
programme.desc: Hyeon-Soo joins an elite team formed by a gangster-turned-investor who attempt their biggest scam to swindle $60,000,000 from the stock market.

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is an Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other's backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.
